H0.text: Which group had a number one hit in July 2010 with 'The Club Is Alive'. Take That

H1.text: Which group had a number one hit in July 2010 with 'The Club Is Alive'. Westlife

H2.text: Which group had a number one hit in July 2010 with 'The Club Is Alive'. The Wanted

H3.text: Which group had a number one hit in July 2010 with 'The Club Is Alive'. .jls

A4.text: The song debuted on the UK Singles Chart at number one on 11 July 2010.

A5.text: The song was released in the United Kingdom on 2 July 2010 as the lead single from their second studio album, Outta This World.
